channel.title: [PI]Adding Godwars Map[PI]
channel.description:
How do I add a godwars map to a PI server? I've tried taking the code from a client with it added and adding to to my server (taking code from: client.java, modeldecompressor etc) I followed a guide on adding it to a 317 non renamed and just found the code in the client with godwars map and added it to my client. I compile with no errors but the maps dont show up :(
Any help is appreciated :)
